<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shed Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=5641) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=760" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 26 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Iruxi Armaments](/Feats.aspx?ID=5633)

**Trigger**
You become [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77).

**Requirements**
You have a fully grown tail.

</column>

---

You can shed a portion of your tail to escape. You cease being grabbed, then Stride without triggering any reactions from the creature that grabbed you. It takes 1 day for your tail to fully grow back. Until it does, you can't use your tail unarmed attack, and you take a –2 circumstance penalty on checks to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=2369).
name: Shed Tail
requirement: You have a fully grown tail.
